text:
Henri "Harry/Harrie" Steevens (born 27 April 1945) is a retired Dutch cyclist. His career lasted from 1960 and 1972. He competed at the 1964 Summer Olympics in the individual road race and finished in 40th place.
Two years later he won a silver medal in the team time trial at the 1966 UCI Road World Championships. He also won the Olympia's Tour (1965), Ronde van Limburg (1966) and Amstel Gold Race (1968).
His brother Henk Steevens was also a cyclist.
